head.title: ETHBTC Ethereum Bitcoin - Currency Exchange Rate Live Price Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: Ethereum Bitcoin traded at 0.0750168 this Tuesday November 8th, decreasing 0.0011998 or 1.57 percent since the previous trading session. Looking back, over the last four weeks, ETHBTC lost 10.14 percent. Over the last 12 months, its price rose by 5.33 percent. Looking ahead, we forecast Ethereum Bitcoin to be priced at 0.0740756 by the end of this quarter and at 0.0669084 in one year, according to Trading Economics global macro models projections and analysts expectations.

meta.content: The USDISK decreased 0.6300 or 0.43% to 145.0700 on Tuesday November 8 from 145.7000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Icelandic Krona reached an all time high of 149.33 in December of 2008.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDISK decreased 0.6300 or 0.43% to 145.0700 on Tuesday November 8 from 145.7000 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Icelandic Krona reached an all time high of 149.33 in December of 2008. Icelandic Krona - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Icelandic Krona is expected to trade at 148.62 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 156.98 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDISK spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the ISK. While the USDISK spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDISK forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Indonesian Rupiah - 2022 Data - 1994-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The Indonesian rupiah was changing hand around 15,690 against the US dollar on Tuesday after weakening toward 15,750 last week, after official reports showed that the economy grew by 5.72% yoy in Q3, the fastest expansion in five quarters, with household consumption staying strong despite a steep fuel price hike in September and growing cost pressures. Meantime, the country's jobless rate fell to 5.86% in Q3 from 6.49% in the same quarter a year ago, as economic activity fully reopened following strict COVID curbs in the first two quarters of the year. Also, Tuesday's data showed that consumer sentiment in the country picked up in October from September's five-month low, amid ongoing cash transfers and social assistance for households and workers. Elsewhere, the dollar index was steady above 110 ahead of midterm elections in the US. Market participants also anticipated key US inflation data on Thursday that will give further insight into the Feds efforts to curb inflation. Historically, the Indonesian Rupiah reached an all time high of 16800 in June of 1998.

meta.content: The Indonesian rupiah was changing hand around 15,690 against the US dollar on Tuesday after weakening toward 15,750 last week, after official reports showed that the economy grew by 5.72% yoy in Q3, the fastest expansion in five quarters, with household consumption staying strong despite a steep fuel price hike in September and growing cost pressures. Meantime, the country's jobless rate fell to 5.86% in Q3 from 6.49% in the same quarter a year ago, as economic activity fully reopened following strict COVID curbs in the first two quarters of the year. Also, Tuesday's data showed that consumer sentiment in the country picked up in October from September's five-month low, amid ongoing cash transfers and social assistance for households and workers. Elsewhere, the dollar index was steady above 110 ahead of midterm elections in the US. Market participants also anticipated key US inflation data on Thursday that will give further insight into the Feds efforts to curb inflation. Historically, the Indonesian Rupiah reached an all time high of 16800 in June of 1998.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The Indonesian rupiah was changing hand around 15,690 against the US dollar on Tuesday after weakening toward 15,750 last week, after official reports showed that the economy grew by 5.72% yoy in Q3, the fastest expansion in five quarters, with household consumption staying strong despite a steep fuel price hike in September and growing cost pressures. Meantime, the country's jobless rate fell to 5.86% in Q3 from 6.49% in the same quarter a year ago, as economic activity fully reopened following strict COVID curbs in the first two quarters of the year. Also, Tuesday's data showed that consumer sentiment in the country picked up in October from September's five-month low, amid ongoing cash transfers and social assistance for households and workers. Elsewhere, the dollar index was steady above 110 ahead of midterm elections in the US. Market participants also anticipated key US inflation data on Thursday that will give further insight into the Feds efforts to curb inflation.
Historically, the Indonesian Rupiah reached an all time high of 16800 in June of 1998. Indonesian Rupiah - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Indonesian Rupiah is expected to trade at 15834.13 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 16134.67 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDIDR spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the IDR. While the USDIDR spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDIDR forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

h1.span: October 2022 Data - 2008-2021 Historical - November Forecast - Quote

div.h2: The USDIRR traded at 42,000.0000 on Tuesday November 8.
Historically, the Iranian Rial reached an all time high of 49631.40 in August of 2021. Iranian Rial - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Iranian Rial is expected to trade at 42000.00 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 42000.00 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDIRR spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency is currently worth in terms of the other. While the USDIRR spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDIRR forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Iraqi Dinar - 2022 Data - 2010-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDIQD decreased 0.0200 or 0.00% to 1,458.5000 on Tuesday November 8 from 1,458.5200 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Iraqi Dinar reached an all time high of 1460 in December of 2020.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDIQD decreased 0.0200 or 0.00% to 1,458.5000 on Tuesday November 8 from 1,458.5200 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Iraqi Dinar reached an all time high of 1460 in December of 2020. Iraqi Dinar - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Iraqi Dinar is expected to trade at 1458.50 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 1458.50 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDIQD spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the IQD. While the USDIQD spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDIQD forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date..

div.a: Iraq Core Inflation Rate at 5.40 percent

meta.content: The USDKZT increased 1.8900 or 0.41% to 465.0000 on Tuesday November 8 from 463.1100 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Kazakh Tenge reached an all time high of 525.30 in March of 2022.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDKZT increased 1.8900 or 0.41% to 465.0000 on Tuesday November 8 from 463.1100 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Kazakh Tenge reached an all time high of 525.30 in March of 2022. Kazakh Tenge - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Kazakh Tenge is expected to trade at 477.30 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 516.59 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDKZT spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the KZT. While the USDKZT spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDKZT forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Bangladeshi Taka - 2022 Data - 2008-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDBDT decreased 0.3700 or 0.36% to 101.3300 on Tuesday November 8 from 101.7000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Bangladeshi Taka reached an all time high of 105.44 in October of 2022.

meta.content: The USDBDT decreased 0.3700 or 0.36% to 101.3300 on Tuesday November 8 from 101.7000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Bangladeshi Taka reached an all time high of 105.44 in October of 2022.

form.script: var TESymbol = 'USDBDT'; console.log('TESymbol:', TESymbol);var TELanguage = ''; console.log('TELanguage:', TELanguage);TELastUpdate = '202211081715'; console.log('TELastUpdate:', TELastUpdate);TEChart = 'MK'; console.log('TEChart:', TEChart);var TEAlertsName= 'Bangladeshi Taka'; console.log('TEAlertsName:', TEAlertsName);

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDBDT decreased 0.3700 or 0.36% to 101.3300 on Tuesday November 8 from 101.7000 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Bangladeshi Taka reached an all time high of 105.44 in October of 2022. Bangladeshi Taka - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Bangladeshi Taka is expected to trade at 103.64 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 109.69 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDBDT spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the BDT. While the USDBDT spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDBDT forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.
